name: Old Games Pack
description:
These are my unfinished GameMaker games. Please don't try playing them.

Notes:

-in "1" you can press the ground button to go to the unfinished platformer.
-in "3"  you press z to shoot.
-in "4" press any key to go to the main menu.
-in "7" click a sign with the left mouse button to build a fire tower.
-in "10" click on a shape to select it and then use arrow keys to move/rotate.
